titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Energy and Commerce in the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Energy and Commerce in the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Energy and Commerce for the 116th Congress.
